Text.Page:
Did you know I used to be a woodcutter? Yep. Loved working in the woods...until the day I tangled with a {@LinkCreature:10#5#thickbark ghilliedhu}. After that, it's been soldiering and big-game hunting for me. It's safer!

I wouldn't mind getting my hands on some ghilliedhu roots, though. Think you can get some?
That's a lot of roots! So here's a lot of reward!
Look, you've got to cut them down. You can't just wait for them to fall of their own accord.
